\chapter{Orchestrator}
\label{\detokenize{orchestrator:module-app}}\label{\detokenize{orchestrator:orchestrator}}\label{\detokenize{orchestrator::doc}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!app@\spxentry{app}}\index{app@\spxentry{app}!module@\spxentry{module}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
CSCI\sphinxhyphen{}651 Project: Distributed Web Crawler

\sphinxAtStartPar
Implementing a Distributed Web Crawler to crawl different
websites, download all related files, calculate MD5 hash
and send it back to the server.
Uses Docker Container to host the server and MongoDB.
\index{connect\_db() (in module app)@\spxentry{connect\_db()}\spxextra{in module app}}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\chapter{Worker}
\label{\detokenize{worker:module-worker}}\label{\detokenize{worker:worker}}\label{\detokenize{worker::doc}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!worker@\spxentry{worker}}\index{worker@\spxentry{worker}!module@\spxentry{module}}
\sphinxAtStartPar
CSCI\sphinxhyphen{}651 Project: Distributed Web Crawler

\sphinxAtStartPar
Implementing a Distributed Web Crawler to crawl different
websites, download all related files, calculate MD5 hash
and send it back to the server.
Uses Docker Containers to host workers.
\index{compute\_md5() (in module worker)@\spxentry{compute\_md5()}\spxextra{in module worker}}

\begin{fulllineitems}

{}
\pysigstopsignatures
\sphinxAtStartPar
Method to compute MD5 of the downloaded file
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\sphinxlineitem{Parameters}
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{file\_path}} \textendash{} Path of downloaded file to calculate its MD5 hash

\sphinxlineitem{Returns}
\sphinxAtStartPar
MD5 Hash of the file

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

on failures.
